item.title: First Blog Post
item.description:
Exploratory Data Analysis

Preliminaries

In the first blog post, I would like to provide a short guide in the procedures and processes of performing exploratory data analysis (EDA), focusing specifically on Univariate and Bivariate exploratory techniques. Sometimes, the importance of EDA is overlooked because there is a tendency for us …
